contextId.information: This lists these men in order of leadership."2nd ... 3rd ... 4th ... 5th ... 6th ... 7th ... 8th ... 9th ... 10th ... 11th" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])

This shows the order in which the families were chosen. AT: "number 1 ... number 2 ... number 3 ... number 4 ... number 5" or use "the initial" for "the first" and "the next" for all of the following ones. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])

This shows the order in which the families were chosen. AT: "number 6 ... number 7 ... number 8 ... number 9" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])

This shows the order in which the families were chosen. AT: "number 10 ... number 11 ... number 12 ... number 13" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])

This shows the order in which the families were chosen. AT: "number 14 ... number 15 ... number 16 ... number 17" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])

This shows the order in which the families were chosen. "number 18 ... number 19 ... number 20 ... number 21" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])
This shows the order in which the families were chosen. "number 22 ... number 23 ... number 24" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])

This is the second month of the Hebrew calendar. It is during the last part of April and the first part of May on Western calendars. (See: tA topic Hebrew Months and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])

This is the sixth month of the Hebrew calendar. It is during the last part of August and the first part of September on Western calendars. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_hebrewmonths]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])

This is the twelfth and last month of the Hebrew calendar. It is during the last part of February and the first part of March on Western calendars. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_hebrewmonths]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])
